Desc.eng: Ehehheh, Mr. Van Helsing! Allow meâ€¦ my name is Dr. Stahl. How are you feeling today?
Are you a medical doctor or a proper mad scientist?

No, my lady, I treat no maladies. I'm a simple genius, born to defeat the world with giant, exploding machines. Currently I'm helping out the Resistance. I'm also a diplomat, an expert on traps and occult knowledge. At your service!
